title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4055.2 - Application for registration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4055.2 - Application for registration

State Regulations

Application for registration for racing purposes only
must state the age, color, sex, pedigree if known, and distinguishing marks if
any. The application must be accompanied by such other information as may be
required by the stewards of the National steeplechase and Hunt

Association. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4055.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
